overview: In a repressive society reminiscent of "1984," those who engage in sex put everything at risk. Sin CIty and director Jim Enright peirce the veil of the twilight world between fantasy and reality into a world of sexual excess, inmmoral desires and total abandon filled with waron soft lips, wet silky thighs and sin beyond you wildest dreams. . . Waiting for you just behind the blindfold.
title: Blindfold
